metadata.title: CVE-2022-31778 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Improper Input Validation vulnerability in handling the Transfer-Encodingheader of Apache Traffic Server allows an attacker to poison the cache.This issue affects Apache Traffic Server 8.0.0 to 9.0.2.

criterions.comment: trafficserver: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
